name: retrieveConfigurationValues
description: View a list of configurations and their values on a given date.

limit.description: Limit the number of matches returned.

offset.description: Ignore these many matches in the beginning.

node_id.description: The name of the node that require configuration values. Applies a filter specific to the name of node. When no node_id is specified, the filter shows both local and cluster-wide configurations.

namespace.description: The configuration namespace. Applies a filter to the configuration updates for the specified namespace.

name.description: The name of the configuration option. Applies a filter to the configuration updates for the specified option.

on_date.description: The timestamp for which to retrieve configuration values.
